item.title: DSA 557 1.0 Scientific Writing and Communication
item.description: DSA 557 1.0 Scientific Writing and Communication is offered under MSc in Data Science (DS) and Artificial Intelligence (AI). The MSc in DS and AI at USJ was designed in partnership with the Erasmus+ DS and AI consortium, a group of 15 European and Asian organizations with the mission of bringing European-standard advanced education to Asia. Click here to view the course outline. Course content Writing: Thesis Slides Reading LaTex Exercise - Select a data science and AI related paper from https://arxiv.
